title: Hand sanitizers can be used often
content: An alcohol-based sanitizer does not create antibiotic resistance. Unlike other antiseptics and antibiotics, pathogens (harmful germs) do not seem to develop resistance to alcohol-based sanitizers An alcohol-based sanitizer does not create antibiotic resistance.
